task_description: Navigate to Gasolinera Petroecuador. Travel north along the main road, passing Edificio El Quijote on the right. Continue straight for approximately 118 meters. The route ends at the Gasolinera Petroecuador, which is clearly visible on the right side with a blue canopy and price signage.

reason: To follow the instruction to travel north along the main road, the best next step is to continue forward in the current facing direction which is already roughly north-northeast.
We should continue straight along the main road north to reach the gas station, so moving forward is the most consistent action.
We still need to proceed north along the main road for the remaining distance, so continuing forward keeps us on route toward the Petroecuador station on the right.
Continuing straight ahead along the main road remains the correct way to cover the remaining distance to the gas station on the right.
We should keep traveling straight north along the main road toward the expected blue-canopy Petroecuador station on the right.
Staying on the main road and continuing forward should bring the Petroecuador station into view on the right as we near the stated distance.
We are likely close to the target after several forward moves, so we should keep going straight to spot the blue-canopy Petroecuador station on the right.
Continuing forward along the main road is still the most direct way to reach the Petroecuador station expected on the right side.
We should continue straight ahead along the road, taking the forward option to reach the gas station that should appear on the right.
After covering roughly the instructed distance, the destination should now be nearby, so we should look to the right to spot the blue-canopy Petroecuador station and price sign.
Facing east should reveal the gas station on the right side of the road; if it’s not clearly visible yet, we should pan further right to scan for the blue canopy and price signage.
Since the heading did not change and we still need to identify the station on the right, the safest next step is to rotate further right to face south and scan for the blue canopy and price sign.
The view is still locked at 90°E, so to verify the destination we should use the provided preset to look left (toward 0°) and reorient to the main road, then check the right side again.
We need to reorient back to the road’s northbound direction, so rotating right from west to north (0°) will let us confirm the station on the right side.
To get back to a north-facing view down the main road (0°), we should rotate left from 90°E to 0°.
We are currently facing west (270°) and need to face north (0°) to proceed and check the right side for the Petroecuador station, so rotate right by 90°.
We should use the preset to look left to reorient to 0° (north) so we can continue along the main road and then identify the gas station on the right.
The oscillation suggests our yaw deltas aren’t landing on north; using the preset 'Look RIGHT' from 270°W will set heading to 0° (north) to proceed correctly.
